parameters.prompt: dream pop, nostalgic, shimmering, electric piano, breathy vocals, tape delay
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The sidewalks crack like memories / Under August’s fading heat / We traced our names in lemonade sweat / Before the streetlights blinked awake [chorus] Oh, we were infinite then / Just ghosts in the glow / Of a sun that forgot to set [verse] Your laugh still hums in the fan’s slow spin / Through screens where the fireflies press / Like stars too shy to say they’re leaving [chorus] Oh, we were infinite then / Just ghosts in the glow / Of a sun that forgot to set [bridge] Now the yearbook’s spine creaks / A chorus of almosts / Pages stuck at the goodbyes [outro] The sidewalks crack like memories / And I’m still tracing your name
